document_data.name: Lamia Crytrapper
document_data.mainbody: '''Lamia Crytrapper''' was the head of the [[Crytrapper]] family, a major [[Amnian]] family, during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/334/Crimmor: City of Caravans|24}}
document_data.Description: Lady Crytrapper wielded great influence in [[Crimmor]], as she knew of secrets hidden by many important people. She invested in small businesses, focusing on those run by [[:Category:Females|women]], and more particularly those created by widows. She was also known to regularly sponsor [[minstrel]]s.{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2005)/Ethnicity of Crimman characters}}
document_data.Personality: Lamia was a kind and cheerful old lady who loved the countryside.
document_data.Relationships:
Lady Crytrapper had several influential friends and family members:
* Her cousin was [[Corlyn Braen]], Mayor of [[Crimmor]].
* Her sister [[Chynna Crytrapper]] was a priestess in the Crimman [[Church of Lliira]].
